str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A council, tribunal; the Sanhedrin, the meeting place of the Sanhedrin.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To make visible (manifest); hence: I report (inform) against; pass: I appear before. From emphanes; to exhibit or disclose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A commander of a thousand men, a military tribune. From chilioi and archo; the commander of a thousand soldiers
From hos and pos; what(-ever) how, i.e. In the manner that (as adverb or conjunction of coincidence, intentional or actual).

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and ago; to lead down; specially, to moor a vessel.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
To know accurately, examine, decide. From dia and ginosko; to know thoroughly, i.e. Ascertain exactly.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Carefully, exactly, strictly, distinctly. Adverb from the same as akribestatos; exactly.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Ready, prepared. From an old noun heteos; adjusted, i.e. Ready.
From ana and haireomai; to take up, i.e. Adopt; by implication, to take away, i.e. Abolish, murder.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.
